猼字的基本解释

猼
bó
古书上说的一种狗。
古代传说中的一种怪兽，像人而有翅膀。

猼
pò

猼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bó］
［《廣韻》補各切，入鐸，幫。］
(1)犬名。
(2)见“猼訑”。
[②]［pò］
［《集韻》匹各切，入鐸，滂。］
见“猼2且”。

猼字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　猼； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页716第13
【廣韻】補各切【集韻】伯各切，?音博。【廣韻】犬名。　又【集韻】獸名。似人，有翼。【山海經】基山有獸，狀如羊，九尾四耳，目在背，名曰猼訑，佩之不畏。【註】郭璞曰：猼訑，音博施。◎按廣韻別書作䍸䍫。　又【集韻】【韻會】?匹各切，音粕。【司馬相如·子虛賦】諸虎猼且。【註】索隱曰：猼音普各反。【集韻】本作蒪。或作尃。又【集韻】匹沃切，音鞄。【司馬相如·子虛賦註】徐廣曰：猼音匹沃反。○按《漢書》作巴。?詳艸部蒪字註。

猼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
猼字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
猼
bó
A kind of dog mentioned in ancient books.
A monster in ancient legend that looks like a human and has wings.

pò

猼
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bó］
["Guangyun" make up each cut, enter the priest, help. ]
(1) The name of the dog.
(2) See "猼訑".
[②]［pò］
["Ji Yun" each cuts each, enters the duo, and feels unhappy. ]
See "猼2和".
猼
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　猼; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 716 13
[Guang Yun] Complement each cut [Ji Yun] Bo each cut,? Yinbo. 【Guangyun】The name of the dog.　[Jiyun] The name of the beast. Human-like, with wings. [Shanhaijing] There are beasts in Jishan, like a sheep, with nine tails and four ears, and the eyes are on the back. [Note] Guo Pu said: 猼訑, Yinbo Shi. ◎According to Guangyun's special book as a donation.　 [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Each piece is cut, and the sound meal. 【Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu】All tigers are surviving. [Note] Suo Yin said: Huangyinpu all reversed. 【Ji Yun】This is a quintet. Or as Bo. Also 【Jiyun】Pivotche, Yin Yin. [Notes on Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu] Xu Guang said: The sound of the sound is Pivot. ○According to "Han Shu" as a bar. ?Detailed note of the word Chabu Chu.
